title: Samsung Galaxy A53 5G now available in the United States
content:
Samsung revealed the Galaxy A53 last month as the company’s new mid-range smartphone, competing with phones like the Pixel 5A and iPhone SE 3 (2022). Now the phone is available to purchase from Samsung’s own store and multiple carriers in the United States. The Galaxy A53 5G can now be bought at Samsung.com for $449.99,

The post Samsung Galaxy A53 5G now available in the United States appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Galaxy A53 5G is now available to purchase in the United States from Samsung, Verizon, AT&T, and T-Mobile.
